home.title: ABOUT IRIS
home.description: IRIS is an NGO dedicated to connecting volunteers with refugees, promoting shelter, support, and integration. We facilitate financial and essential goods donations, ensuring help reaches those who need it most.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy

dataCollection.title: 1. Data Collected
dataCollection.text: We collect personal data such as name, email, phone, address, and donation history. We also collect sensitive data like refugee health information to provide appropriate assistance, and browsing data (IP, cookies, browser type) for analysis and platform improvement.

items.processDonations: Process donations and issue payment slips;

consent.title: 3. Consent
consent.text: Sensitive data processing will be carried out with the explicit consent of the data subject or legal guardian, as provided in Article 11 of the LGPD.

sharing.title: 4. Data Sharing
sharing.text: We may share data with service providers such as payment gateways, social screenings, or support partners, under agreements ensuring confidentiality and security.

security.title: 5. Storage and Security
security.text: Data is stored on servers with technical and administrative measures to prevent unauthorized access, leaks, or improper changes.

retention.title: 6. Retention Period
retention.text: Data will be kept as long as necessary to achieve the purposes described in this policy or as required by legal and regulatory obligations.

items.question: Who can help?
items.answer: Anyone willing to donate, host, or offer volunteer support can register and help refugees.

items.question: How does the shelter process work?
items.answer: After registering as a shelter, our team will contact you for an interview and guide you through the hosting process.

items.question: Where do the donations go?
items.answer: All donations are directed to registered refugee families and distributed according to urgency and need.

items.question: How do I become a volunteer?
items.answer: Just go to the registration page, select 'Volunteer' and fill out the form. We will contact you with more information.

items.question: Can I donate physical items like clothes or food?
items.answer: Yes. We have partner collection points and also receive items at specific events organized by the NGO.

items.question: Does IRIS operate throughout Brazil?
items.answer: Currently, we are focused on capitals and major urban centers, but we have expansion plans in partnership with other organizations.

items.question: Is there any cost to be a volunteer?
items.answer: No. Being a volunteer at IRIS is completely free, and we provide guidance and support throughout the process.

about.title: About IRIS
about.description1: IRIS is a non-profit organization dedicated to providing humanitarian support to refugees.
about.description2: We connect volunteers, donors, and families in vulnerable situations to promote dignified shelter and real opportunities for integration.
about.description3: IRIS is an initiative aimed at facilitating communication, management, and integration of social actions to support people in vulnerable situations. The system was developed for NGOs, charitable institutions, and volunteers who wish to promote solidarity in an organized and transparent way.
about.description4: With a focus on accessibility, transparency, and usability, IRIS provides tools for registering donors, beneficiaries, tracking donations, and managing reports.

donate.title: Help Transform Lives
donate.description1: We are running a fundraising campaign to support refugees who have recently arrived in Brazil.
donate.description2: Donations will be used to cover basic needs such as food, clothing, medicine, and transportation.
donate.description3: Part of your donation will also help families and individuals who are generously offering their homes.
donate.description4: Together, we can offer shelter, dignity, and hope.
